## colorManipulator.lighten() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

### colorManipulator.lighten() function

Lightens a color.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function lighten(color: string, coefficient: number): string;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { colorManipulator } from '@grafana/data';
const { lighten } = colorManipulator;
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | <code>string</code> | CSS color, i.e. one of: \#nnn, \#nnnnnn, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla(), color() |
|  coefficient | <code>number</code> | multiplier in the range 0 - 1 |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

A CSS color string. Hex input values are returned as rgb
